name: GuestChat Bot
author: Guestchat

sections.description:
Turn your website visitors into hotel guests using our chatbot widget. The GuestChat WordPress plugin installs our widget on your site, allowing you to automate conversations with prospective guests in real-time. The bot encourages direct bookings by providing room rates and availability as well as incentives and specials. View more information on www.guestchat.com
Features:
1. Chat with your prospective guests 24/7/365
2. Answer their questions instantly
3. Convert website visitors into guest reservations
4. Increase direct bookings
5. Reduce commissions from OTAs (Online Travel Agents)
6. Generate & qualify leads
7. Automate your customer support

External Service

This plugin is for simplifying the placement of the chatbot widget on your wordpress website. The actual code of the bot is hosted by Guestchat.com where it is maintained and updated as needed. All traffic and interaction of the bot will be directed to guestchat’s servers (securely). You can get more information on the service we provide by visiting www.guestchat.com.

Privacy Policy and Terms of SErvice

View our Privacy Policy – https://guestchat.com/privacy-policy/
View our Terms of Service – https://guestchat.com/terms-of-service/
sections.faq:
How do I get a Client Key?

We will email you a client key once you have registered with us at www.guestchat.com.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Choose to place the bot on all pages, or place with a shortcode

1.0.3

  • Version bump

1.0.4

  • Version bump
